channel.title: Grammar/spelling mistakes for UD?
channel.description:
Word: Good songs Definition: A term that is commonly thrown around among preteen kids. I don't recall ANYTHING that is currently being listened to by these confused faggots is even considered "music". Who is "lil wayne"? Who is "Justin bieber?" Who is "Jason Derulo"? I'll tell you. These are egotistical cumshots who think "OH LOOK AT ME I CAN COMPOSE GOOD MUSIC." But in reality, no. The only people that listen to this bullshit are confused preteen girls, and faggots. All of you think you're cool, with your gay rap, music that takes no talent what so ever. You know what you need to do? You need to listen to some good music, then you can properly use the term "Good songs". Example: Girl1: "yo, did u hear da new lil wayne album yo??? SHIT WUZ DOPE" Boy1: "No fuck off you tasteless piece of living garbage, you're music sucks and you're an asshole.."
I'm about to post that. Any grammar/spelling mistakes? Note: This was not posted to offend anyone, if you're offended... Well, shut the fuck up, I don't care.

item.title: Grammar/spelling mistakes for UD?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:10, topic:319654”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=416123.msg3063570#msg3063570 date=1261035837]

I personally like R&B, hip hop, pop, rap, etc.

R&B - Retards and Blacks
Hip Hop - Blacks talking about fucking all the time
Rap - Retards Attempting Poetry

See the theme?
[/quote]except for R&B ur fukin clueless. Run DMC is orssim[/quote]

Ok, i must admint Run DMC is the shit. Everyone else is retarded though

Read full topic

[/quote]

R&B - Retards and Blacks

item.title: Grammar/spelling mistakes for UD?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

faggots is even considered "music". Who is "lil wayne"? Who is "Justin bieber?" Who is "Jason Derulo"? I'll tell you.
should be
faggots is even considered "music[b].[/b]" Who is "[b]'L[/b]il [b]W[/b]ayne[b]?[/b]" Who is "Justin [b]B[/b]ieber?" Who is "Jason Derulo[b]?[/b]" I'll tell you.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar/spelling mistakes for UD?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:4, topic:319654”]This:

you’re music sucks and you’re an asshole…

Should be this:

your music sucks and you’re an asshole…[/quote]

Good point, thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar/spelling mistakes for UD?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

This:

you're music sucks and you're an asshole..

Should be this:

[b]your[/b] music sucks and you're an asshole..

Read full topic
